Name: Bourbonella
Ingredients: 3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: A cocktail of unknown origin from the noughties, which takes its name from its base spirit. A fascinating fact: Bourbonnella is also the name of an extinct genus of prehistoric freshwater and coastal marine ray-finned fish.
Nutrition: One serving of Bourbonella contains 199 calories
